name: Forza Motorsport
description:
Witness the power of Xbox Series X through Forza Motorsport. Automotive entertainment is reimagined for a new generation.
Instead of continuing the 15-year-old simulation racing franchise’s numerical naming scheme with “Forza Motorsport 8,” Microsoft is dropping the number for this entry in the series. It’s just going to be called Forza Motorsport — the same as the Xbox game that kicked off the franchise back in 2005.
